section.descr: Boysun Ko'xinur Travel is a team offering the highest quality tourism services. We offer you the opportunity to discover a new world for yourself in Uzbekistan and offer the highest quality at affordable prices.

prising.title: Hotels
prising.descr: Poor quality services always hinder the enjoyment of travel. But we offer the best quality hotels for you to enjoy the pleasure of travel.

prising.title: Restaurants
prising.descr: Spend unforgettable moments of your life with the best quality restaurants in Uzbekistan.

prising.title: Wonderful nature
prising.descr: A great choice to enjoy is nature travel, because relaxing in nature can improve your health and reduce stress, so enjoy the nature of Uzbekistan with us.

prising.title: Meals
prising.descr: We provide the highest quality services for you to enjoy the national dishes of Uzbekistan.

prising.title: Transports
prising.descr: Considering that Uzbekistan is a huge country, it will take a long time to enjoy it all, but we will serve you with our turbo-speed vehicles.
